attributes.review: Everyone said that this app took days or weeks to download but it took me two YEARS! This is not okay. Remove this app immediately.
attributes.title: DON’T GET THIS APP

attributes.review: It kept having technical difficulties?? Every few words were replaced with a slur, a fifth grade reading level, and misogyny??? And I think I saw a swastika??
attributes.title: Racist?

attributes.review: Looked forward to this app but it destroyed my battery life and built walls up so I could not get into any other app.
attributes.title: So sad...

attributes.review: i’m canadian but i got the app to see what’s happening down in america and i think it’s probably all burning down at the moment because of this horrid orange dude but i tried to delete it and it made my phone all glitchy and called me many slurs! i would not recommend at all, 0/10
attributes.title: bad app!!

attributes.review: It messes up your phone says racist things there are many lies and it just takes way to long. This app is absolutely terrible !!DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.title: This app HURTS

attributes.review: I downloaded this to try and support my non racist. Kind. Caring. President. But the app hacked me and I got a message saying that the trump army was gonna use my body to build a wall. DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: 0 STAR 🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬

attributes.review: The app took 29 WEEKS to download and once I tried using it I got hacked and some weird person sent a bag full of 26 bill nye action figures don’t EVEN THINK ABOUT DOWNLOADING IT
attributes.title: AWFUL 🤧

attributes.review: It took 5 days to download and took most of my storage do not download
attributes.title: Biggest mistake have done in my life

attributes.review: the app asked for my number and when i gave it it send me various text messages to which i politely asked it to stop and it CURSED ME !! ABSOLUTELY do not recommend.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING

attributes.review: This app is really confusing, it took me a whole day to download this app. There are so many apps that are better then this, for example:TIKToK
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD❌‼️‼️
